title: what is the current working replay recorder for OCE?
body:
replay.gg don't work, never connects to oce riot for some reason
LOLReplay crashes client
Baron Replays don't work, don't know why
SkinSpotlight don't work, record says "broken record or still recording" or something like that, and just stay like that for hours

any other option guys?

replies.body:
http://www.replay.gg/search/na/Wuks

Replay.GG is the best one, in my opinion.
If it ever connects to rior

The service appears to be up, as far as I'm aware. 

http://www.replay.gg/search/oce/Wuks

I prefer [BaronReplays](https://ahri.tw/en/FAQ/). You probably just don't have something set up right. Make sure your client path is set to this, depending on where you have your files; 
> G:\Games\LoL\RADS\solutions\lol_game_client_sln\releases\ *highest number*\deploy\League of Legends.exe

Thanks man
Will check again tonight
